content: प्रकर्षः {@--1@} Excellence, eminence, superiority; वपुःप्रकर्षादजयद्गुरुं रघुः <ls>R. 3. 34</ls>; वर्णप्रकर्षे सति <ls>Ku. 3. 28.</ls> {@--2@} Intensity, high degree, excess; प्रकर्षगतेन शोकसंतानेन <ls>U. 3.</ls> {@--3@} Strength, power. {@--4@} Absoluteness. {@--5@} Length, protraction. {@--6@} Speciality. {@--7@} Universality. (प्रकर्षेण and प्रकर्षात् are used adverbially in the sense of ‘exceedingly’, ‘pre-eminently’, ‘in a high degree’).
